title: Minutes of Tainan City Government’s 411st Municipal Administrative Meeting Mayor’s remarks 10/22/2019
content: Mayor’s Remarks:1. With the premise of not violating related regulations, government-owned property may be sold concerning the interest of citizens. The price of the government-owned land should be decided under discretion.2. Directorate General of Highways, Ministry of Traffic and Communications asked city governments to install vision auxiliary system on all official vehicles. Concerned bureaus should complete such installation by the end of this year to comply with national regulation and to reduce accident rates of government vehicles.3. The Finance and Local Tax Bureau and Bureau of Education should discuss about whether the performance bonuses could be granted to teachers earlier.
